T
he Petitioners submitted that on the 13th of July 2023, an Annual General Meeting had
been held in which the 2nd Respondent had submitted a new Constitution and alleged that
the  said  meeting  was  only  attended  by  80  members.  The  Petitioners  have  failed  to
demonstrate to this Court whether they attended the said meeting and also, they have failed
to submit the minutes of the said meeting. In our view, especially in the absence of such
the Petitioners' contention of presenting and adopting a new Constitution at the  meeting
